name: Avoid The Obstacles
description:
Avoid The Obstacles is a 2 player local multiplayer game about cooperatively avoiding obstacles at an infinitely increasing rate to break the highscore. If you grow your own character, your partner's will shrink, allowing them to pass through tiny gaps.
The sense of flow you get while playing at high speeds is exhilarating. 

  • Good old 2 players, 1 keyboard couch coop gaming!
  • High intensity, reaction-based, endless running with a friend!
  • Online partner-highscores, so you can compete with the world!
  • Interactive tutorial to help you get into the flow!
